news.headline: US Supreme Court rejects Exxon's appeal of $14.25 million air pollution penalty
news.summary: (Reuters) -The U.S. Supreme Court turned away on Monday Exxon Mobil Corp's bid to overturn a $14.25 million civil penalty that a judge imposed in a long-running lawsuit over air pollution at its Baytown, Texas, crude oil refinery.
